titleStmt.title: Speculum gratitudinis; or, David's thankfulness unto God for all His benefits Expressed in a sermon on the 29th of May, 1664. being Whitsunday, and the day of the happy birth and return of our Gracious King, Charles the Second. By John Kerswel, B.D. and rector of Goddington in Oxford-shire.
titleStmt.author: Kerswell, John.

titleStmt.title: Speculum gratitudinis; or, David's thankfulness unto God for all His benefits Expressed in a sermon on the 29th of May, 1664. being Whitsunday, and the day of the happy birth and return of our Gracious King, Charles the Second. By John Kerswel, B.D. and rector of Goddington in Oxford-shire.
titleStmt.author: Kerswell, John.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Speculum gratitudinis; or, David's thankfulness.
Many pages numbered in MS; final page numbered 131; changed to "141" in MS.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
